org.usfirst.frc.team1736.lib.Util

Class DaBouncer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.usfirst.frc.team1736.lib.Util.DaBouncer

  • public class DaBouncer
extends java.lang.Object
    DESCRIPTION:
    Threshold and Debounce library for signal conditioning USAGE:
    1. Instantiate class
    2. Set Threshold and dbnc (time) globals
    3. Call *Debounce() method once per loop with each new signal value to debounce the signal

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int dbnc
      Debounce time (in loops)
      double threshold
      Debouncer threshold (for "above" or "below" calculation)

    • Constructor Summary

      DaBouncer()
      Constsructor.

    • Field Detail

      • threshold

        public double threshold
        Debouncer threshold (for "above" or "below" calculation)

      • dbnc

        public int dbnc
        Debounce time (in loops)

    • Constructor Detail

      • DaBouncer

        public DaBouncer()
        Constsructor. Set the threshold and debounce by setting the "threshold" and "dbnc" class variables

    • Method Detail

      • AboveDebounce

        public boolean AboveDebounce(double input)
        Call once per periodic loop. Counts samples which are above the threshold Outputs true if the signal has been above the threshold for the debounce duration, false otherwise Output goes false as soon as the signal drops below the threshold.
        Parameters:
        input - Signal to debounce
        Returns:
        True if timer expired & still above threshold, false if not.

      • BelowDebounce

        public boolean BelowDebounce(double input)
        Call once per periodic loop. Counts samples which are below the threshold Outputs true if the signal has been below the threshold for the debounce duration, false otherwise Output goes false as soon as the signal rises above the threshold.
        Parameters:
        input - Signal to debounce
        Returns:
        True if timer expired & still below threshold, false if not.
